data.actual_result: Nothing happens, the pop-up doesn't appear
data.expected_result: After double tapping on the text, a pop-up should appear, as it does with VoiceOver disabled
data.short_description: "Forgot your password?" doesn't work with VoiceOver enabled
data.steps_to_repro: - Log out of Discord - Go to Settings > General > Accessibility > VoiceOver and turn on VoiceOver - Go back to Discord and tap on `Login` - Attempt to tap on the blue `Forgot your password?` text
